name: Achievement Hunter: Offensive
description:
In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the main hero-terrorist who tries to stop the creatures who are trying to destroy his hideout, in which he hides.
You do not have allies, only you, your weapons and a huge number of enemies.
Fight for your house, upgrade your skills, upgrade weapons and do not let your enemies destroy your house.

Game features
-Minimum allowable price
-Real weapons
-Fearless protagonis
